body.name: 1080P Smart Video Doorbell Included Ring Chime, Night Vision, Wide-Angle Lens, Battery Powered, 2 Way Audio, Human Detection, Security Camera Wireless for Indoor/Outdoor Surveillance
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 13 hrs 14 mins
features: Robust Cloud Storage Security: Experience AES-128 encrypted cloud storage with optional subscription plans (sold separately) for added convenience. Cloud storage enjoy a 30-day free trial to explore recording, reviewing, and sharing your videos with ease.

Complimentary Chime Included: Enhance your experience with a free doorbell chime that you can place anywhere in your home. Pair one smart doorbell camera with multiple indoor chimes for optimal coverage.

Cutting-Edge Night Vision: 1080P doorbell camera wireless equipped with six infrared lights and a smart IR sensor, monitor your home around the clock with clear, high-resolution video, even in low-light conditions.
Intelligent AI-Powered Human Detection: Activate the smart AI human detection feature to accurately identify people while disregarding other moving objects, ensuring precise security alerts.
Cutting-Edge Night Vision: Equipped with six infrared lights and a smart IR sensor, monitor your home around the clock with clear, high-resolution video, even in low-light conditions.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Smart Video Doorbell Included, Wide-Angle Lens, Battery Powered, 2 Way Audio, Night Vision Intelligent AI-Powered Human Detection: Activate the smart AI human detection feature to accurately identify people while disregarding other moving objects, ensuring precise security alerts.All-Weather Resilience: IP65 dustproof and waterproof certification provide the wireless doorbell camera can endure rain, sun, heat, or snow, providing dependable security all year round.High-Speed 2.4GHz Wi-Fi Compatibility: Exclusively designed for 2.4Ghz Wi-Fi, the doorbell camera ensures fast and stable connectivity for seamless performance (5GHz Wi-Fi not supported).Convenient Charging Solutions: Simply remove the insulation tape from the battery and charge it fully before first use. Rechargeable batteries can be charged using the included USB cable and a DC 5V 1A or 5V 2A power adapter (charging adapter not included).

Cutting-Edge Night Vision Equipped with six infrared lights and a smart IR sensor, monitor your home around the clock with clear, high-resolution video, even in low-light conditions. Seamless Two-Way Communication Effortlessly engage with visitors from anywhere, ensuring smooth interaction and enhanced security. Intelligent AI-Powered Human Detection Activate the smart AI human detection feature to accurately identify people while disregarding other moving objects, ensuring precise security alerts.

Accessories include Chime Enhance your experience with a doorbell chime that you can place anywhere in your home. Pair one smart doorbell with multiple indoor chimes for optimal coverage. All-Weather Resilience IP65 dustproof and waterproof certification allows the video doorbell can endure rain, sun, heat, or snow, providing dependable security all year round. Robust Cloud Storage Security Experience AES-128 encrypted cloud storage with optional subscription plans (sold separately) for added convenience. Cloud storage enjoy a 30-day free trial to explore recording, reviewing, and sharing your videos with ease.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It was on time and exactly what I was looking for.I love the fact it stay charged for weeks and weeks at a time !!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wasn’t sure how good this would be for the price but I am totally impressed !! Installation and setup was a breeze & the app is very user friendly. I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend purchasing this to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gives me peace of mind
reviews.reviewText: I really love this doorbell. I’m a single mom with a 4 year old little boy and live on the ground level. I’ve had a couple issues with creepy guys showing up at my door after midnight and it scared me so bad. This camera has great quality and gives me peace of mind. Definitely recommended!
